user_flows.description: Set up custom feeds to organize and filter incoming social media content
prerequisites: User has Admin or Team Lead permissions

steps.action: Navigate to Feed overview in Engage
steps.description: Access the central hub for content monitoring
Initiate feed creation process
Choose networks, channels, message types, read status, assignments
Set spam filters, language, labels, keywords, sentiment, priority
Provide descriptive title for easy identification

expected_outcomes: Custom feed appears in sidebar navigation
Content matching filters displays in feed column
Team members can access shared feeds
citations: Source: Engage/Creating Feeds & Viewing Content/Creating and Managing Feeds.pdf

user_flows.description: Implement recommended feed structure for efficient content management

steps.description: Set filter 'Marked as read by: Nobody' for new content
Set filters 'Marked as read by: Nobody' and 'Assigned to: Me'
Set filters 'Marked as read by: Me' and 'Marked as read by: Anybody'
Drag and drop feeds to reorder by importance

expected_outcomes: Clear content progression from unread to handled
source_documents: Engage/Getting Started with Engage/Advanced search and filters.pdf
citations: Source: Engage/Creating Feeds & Viewing Content/Feed Best Practices.pdf

user_flows.description: Respond to and manage incoming social media messages across platforms

steps.description: Click message to open in Detail View
Examine conversation thread and customer profile
Select public reply, private reply, or direct message
Write reply or select from templates
Publish response and automatically mark message as handled

decision_points.impact: Determines visibility and privacy of interaction

expected_outcomes: Message marked as handled in system
citations: Source: Engage/Handling Content/Overview of Handling Content.pdf

user_flows.description: Transition public conversations to private direct messages for sensitive topics
prerequisites: Applicable content type (Facebook posts/comments, Instagram posts/mentions)
No previous DM reply sent to this content

steps.description: Find Facebook post or Instagram mention to respond to
Click to expand content for interaction options
Reveal action buttons including Message option
Initiate direct message reply process
Write response in popup dialog
Click send to deliver private reply

decision_points.impact: Determines conversation visibility and customer experience

expected_outcomes: Original content marked with 'Replied with direct message' indicator
New DM thread appears in direct message feeds
citations: Source: Engage/Handling Content/Replying via Direct Message.pdf

user_flows.description: Create reusable message templates for consistent customer responses
prerequisites: User has Admin or Team Leader role

steps.description: Navigate via Engage message or Settings > Organization admin
Start template creation process
Provide name and message content
Select teams and channels with access
Make template available for use
Select from template dropdown when replying

citations: Source: Engage/Handling Content/Response Templates in Engage.pdf

user_flows.description: Create automated actions for repetitive content management tasks
prerequisites: User has Admin or Team Lead permissions

steps.description: Access Engage > Automation > Automation rules
Start automation rule creation
Set triggers based on language, text, network, channel, content type
Choose actions: assign, label, mark as read/spam, hide, create case
Choose 'Match Any' or 'Match All' conditions
Provide descriptive name and set content scope

decision_points.impact: Defines which content the rule affects

expected_outcomes: Automated content processing reduces manual work
Improved response times for routine tasks
citations: Source: Engage/Additional Features & Automation/Automation Rules.pdf

user_flows.description: Set up welcome and away messages for customer communications

steps.description: Navigate to Engage > Automation > Automated messages
Define group name and select applicable channels
Create greeting for first customer contact
Set message for outside business hours
Set days, times, and timezone for away periods
Enable message toggles for live operation

citations: Source: Engage/Additional Features & Automation/Automated Messages.pdf

user_flows.description: Escalate complex customer issues to structured case management

steps.description: Determine message requires case management
Click briefcase icon on applicable message
Set title, priority, assignee, and internal notes
Save case and monitor in case tab
Progress through Open, In Progress, On Hold, Closed

decision_points.impact: Affects response expectations and resource allocation

expected_outcomes: Case history maintained for future reference
citations: Source: Engage/Additional Features & Automation/Creating and Managing Cases.pdf

user_flows.description: Automatically generate cases based on predefined conditions

steps.description: Set conditions that warrant automatic case creation
Choose automated case creation as rule action
Review auto-created cases in case overview
Allocate resources to automated cases

decision_points.impact: Determines case creation frequency and relevance

citations: Source: Engage/Additional Features & Automation/Creating and Managing Cases.pdf

user_flows.description: Assign messages to team members for collaborative handling

steps.description: Identify content requiring specific team member
Access assignment options from message actions
Select team member or team for assignment
Provide context or instructions
Save assignment and notify assignee

citations: Source: Engage/Team Collaboration/Content Assignment in Engage.pdf

user_flows.description: Share custom feeds with team members for collaborative monitoring

steps.description: Access feed configuration options
Select teams and users for feed access
Define read/write access levels
Make feed available to selected team members

decision_points.impact: Determines feed accessibility and maintenance responsibility

citations: Source: Engage/Team Collaboration/Feed Sharing.pdf

user_flows.description: Perform actions on multiple pieces of content simultaneously
prerequisites: Admin or Team Lead permissions for bulk operations

steps.description: Use checkboxes to select multiple messages
Select from available bulk operations
Set specific options for bulk operation
Apply action to all selected content
Confirm all items processed correctly

decision_points.impact: Determines the change applied to selected content

citations: Source: Engage/Handling Content/Bulk Actions.pdf

user_flows.flow_name: Bulk Mark as Read by Date
user_flows.description: Mark all content before a specific date as read for feed cleanup

steps.description: Navigate to Settings > Channel admin
Choose channel for bulk operation
Find 'Bulk mark as read' section
Choose date before which content should be marked read
Click 'Mark as Read' to process all content

citations: Source: Engage/Handling Content/Bulk Mark as Read by Date.pdf

user_flows.description: Identify, label, and manage spam or inappropriate content

steps.description: Evaluate content against community guidelines
Decide appropriate response based on content type
Mark as spam, hide, delete, or label appropriately
Add notes explaining moderation rationale

decision_points.impact: Affects content visibility and community standards
Determines if platform takes additional action

citations: Source: Engage/Handling Content/Moderating Spam.pdf

user_flows.description: Use Engage mobile app for on-the-go content management

steps.description: Launch app and authenticate
Check for new content requiring attention
Handle time-sensitive customer communications
Update content status for team coordination

citations: Source: Engage/Getting Started/The Hub Mobile App.pdf

user_flows.description: Generate custom feeds based on keyword search results

steps.description: Enter keywords in Engage search
Evaluate content relevance and volume
Convert search into permanent feed
Provide title and adjust filters if needed
Make search-based feed available

expected_outcomes: Ability to track brand mentions and topics
citations: Source: Engage/Creating Feeds & Viewing Content/Creating a Feed from a Search.pdf

user_flows.description: Apply labels to content for categorization and reporting

steps.description: Choose message or conversation to categorize
Click label action or access from menu
Select from existing labels or create new ones
Save label assignments to content
Confirm labels appear on content

citations: Source: Engage/Team Collaboration/Labeling Content.pdf

user_flows.description: Monitor and respond to content based on emotional sentiment

steps.description: Check positive, neutral, negative classifications
Focus on potentially problematic content
Tailor response tone to sentiment context
Create cases for serious negative sentiment

decision_points.impact: Affects customer satisfaction and brand perception

citations: Source: Engage/Creating Feeds & Viewing Content/Sentiment.pdf

user_flows.description: View and manage customer profile information for better service

steps.description: Click on customer name or profile in conversation
Check interaction history, notes, and previous cases
Document important customer information
Consolidate duplicate customer profiles

citations: Source: Engage/Team Collaboration/Customer Profiles.pdf

user_flows.description: Manage content across different social media platforms with awareness of platform-specific limitations

steps.description: Understand what content types are supported per platform
Set up feeds tailored to each platform's content types
Work within API constraints for each network
Ensure consistent brand voice across all platforms

decision_points.impact: Affects resource allocation and response quality

citations: Source: Engage/Getting Started/Supported Networks and Channels in Engage.pdf

user_flows.description: Configure email notifications for feed updates and team coordination

steps.description: Open feed configuration options
Toggle notification settings for feed
Set how often notifications are sent
Verify notifications work as expected

citations: Source: Engage/Team Collaboration/Email notifications in Engage.pdf

user_flows.description: Export Engage data for external analysis and compliance

steps.description: Navigate to feed or report export features
Choose time period and content scope
Select file format and data fields
Generate and download export file

decision_points.impact: Determines data completeness and file size

citations: Source: Engage/Reports/Exporting Data from Engage.pdf

user_flows.description: Generate reports on team performance and engagement metrics

steps.description: Navigate to Engage reporting features
Choose from team performance, label reports, etc.
Set date range, teams, and metrics
Create report and analyze results
Distribute insights to stakeholders

citations: Source: Engage/Reports/Creating Engage Reports.pdf
